A date palm juice collector, locally known as a gachi, collects sap from a palm tree in Baiguni village of Kalai upazila in Joypurhat on Monday. The sap is used to produce Patali and Lali jaggery, which are in high demand in the local market as well as in surrounding areas. During the winter season, collectors expect to earn a substantial income from the sale of date palm juice and molasses. -Saud Abdullah
